# subscript(_:)

**Instance Subscript**

Accesses a color attachment at a specific index.

## Declaration

```swift
subscript(attachmentIndex: Int) -> MTL4RenderPipelineColorAttachmentDescriptor! { get set }
```

## Parameters

- **attachmentIndex**: Index of the attachment to access.
